links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,12).
mathematica: Join[{a=0,b=1},Table[c=5*b+12*a;a=b;b=c,{n,100}]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 16 2011*)LinearRecurrence[{5, 12}, {0, 1}, 30] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 13 2012 *)
prog: (Sage) [lucas_number1(n,5,-12) for n in xrange(0, 21)]# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 24 2009](MAGMA) [n le 2 select n-1 else 5*Self(n-1) + 12*Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 13 2012
